snippet.title: Alcohol Use and 8 Other Risk Factors for Early Dementia Identified
snippet.description: * Alcohol Use and 8 Other Risk Factors for Early Dementia Identified New research shows nine risk factors trigger early onset dementia, many of which can be prevented beginning in adolescence.

snippet.title: Fantastically Freeze Dried
snippet.description: * Fantastically Freeze Dried ...Research, it’s time for at least one category, freeze dried fruits, to get an image overhaul (pay attention Tom Cruise –– just kidding!). Scientists say these crunchy, light weight goodies retain almost all of the disease fighting phytochemicals found...

snippet.title: Famous Faces of Menopause
snippet.description: * Famous Faces of Menopause Healthline offers inspiration to menopausal women via five famous faces of menopause and how they’ve tackled menopause in their own unique ways.

snippet.title: Obstetrical Ultrasound - A Sinister Cause for Concern?
snippet.description: * Obstetrical Ultrasound - A Sinister Cause for Concern? Ultrasound is so widely considered completely ‘safe’ that if you have enough money, like Tom Cruise, you can buy your own machine and use it every day; and “Fetal Foto” shops, employing 3-D and 4-D ultrasound imaging are springing up in strip malls all...
